Figure `r figNum(1)` shows how to place multiple images or plots in a single figure
frame. It also illustrates different learning loss trajectories and recovery patterns
that the state might encounter in student growth over an extended timeline. This
emphasizes the importance of being able to measure and monitor student growth
this year and going forward in 2022.
